item.title: CareView Communications Inc 10-K
item.description: CareView Communications Inc, which is in the Radio & Tv Broadcasting & Communications Equipment [3663] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 08, 2021 had 27414 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
